selftimer: Yes, 10 sec (2 sec with mirror lock-up)
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Selective Single Point, Single, Continuous, Face Detection, Live View
whitebalancing: Auto, Preset (Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten light, White fluorescent light, Flash)
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1.6x), No. Of Focus Points (9), Lens peripheral illumination correction, Metering Range (EV 0 - 18), AF-Assist Beam
dustreduction: Yes, Manual, Dust Delete Data appended
operatingsystem: Windows XP SP2, Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista, Windows XP SP1, Mac OS X v10.5 - Mac OS X v10.6
shootingmodes: Auto, Program AE (P), Shutter Priority AE, Aperture Priority AE, Manual (M), Auto Depth-of-field, Portrait, Landscape, Close-up, Sports, Night portrait, No Flash, Creative Auto
display: 2.7 inch TFT color LCD, liquid-crystal monitor
